title: Systemd-Free Distro Nitrux Kicks Off 2024 with New ISO Release
description:
Nitrux 3.2.1 is available for download powered by Linux kernel 6.6.9 LTS and the KDE Plasma 5.27.10 LTS desktop environment. Here's what's new!

The post Systemd-Free Distro Nitrux Kicks Off 2024 with New ISO Release appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
